metadata.dc:author: Esclapez Valero, J P
Chiquillo Barber, M T
Bernal Sprekelsen, J C
Gómez-Ferrer Bayo, F
Mendoza Aroca, A
Bort Martí, J
Martínez Agulló, A
Ruiz del Castillo, J
metadata.dc:description: We present our experience in the surgical treatment of 14 cases of Zenker's diverticulum, diagnosed from January, 1969 to December, 1988. In 11 cases we performed one stage diverticulectomy; in 4 cases, manometric findings required cricopharyngeal myotomy. In 3 cases surgical treatment was not indicated; 2 patients had liver cirrhosis and high surgical risk and the third patient declined the treatment. Current treatment is discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento quirúrgico del divertículo de Zenker. A propósito de 14 casos.
[Surgical treatment of Zenker's diverticulum. Apropos of 14 cases].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
